list.name: SPEED-ZONE
list.description: Stu drops a booster that makes himself, his teammates and other allies move faster while inside its area of effect.
list.descriptionHtml: Stu drops a booster that makes himself, his teammates and other allies move faster while inside its area of effect.

list.name: BREAKTHROUGH
list.description: Stu's next Super can bash through obstacles, making debris fly forward. Each piece of debris deals x damage to any opponent it hits.
list.descriptionHtml: Stu's next Super can bash through obstacles, making debris fly forward. Each piece of debris deals x damage to any opponent it hits.
